div.p: Staff Directory | Sitemap | Contact Us | Translate

div.div: Resources available for families during COVID-19

CISD Family Services has pulled together resources available to help families during this time. Please click on the link to find help locally for many different needs. From information about the Commerce Food Pantry, contacts regarding mental health, information about Carevide medical services and many other services, click on the link that defines your interest.
Family Resources Stay safe and be well!

div.p: In partnership with families and community, CISD will provide all students an exemplary education, preparing them to be successful, productive citizens.

p.span: Commerce Independent School District | 3315 Washington St. | Commerce, Texas 75428 | (Phone) 903.886.3755
